name: to-do app
description: full-stack app that allows a user to insert and delete tasks.

name: tv show picker
description: front-end app that fetches tv show data from an API. User can navigate between shows with a dropdown and filter shows and episodes using a search bar

description: perlin noise experiment using p5.js. Emulates moving clouds.
